text: Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie's divorce is said to be moving forward despite persistent reports that the couple may be reconciling. But sources revealed to MailOnline that'nothing has changed'with the couple, as they continue towards divorce following their bitter split in September 2016. Close insiders divulged :'Nothing has changed, they are both focused on the kids and the divorce has continued to move forward '.
